title: Krachao Seeda
overview: A beautiful lady "Ramnam" has the only defect in her life which was a child of poor servant. She determined to herself that she would do everything to make her life better until no one insulted on her origin. Ramnam secretly loved "Lue", her own adoptive parent even though he officially had a wife "Nampink". Therefore, Ramnam tried to incite her that Lue flirted with many girls. Nampink believed her, without knowing that this was Ramnam's wicked plan to get rid of Nampink and become Lue's wife. The relationship between Ramnam and Lue disclosed little by little, Lue felt jealous when seeing Ramnam seduced other men. Until Nampink found out that they slept together, she was terribly shocked. However, Nampink was not as weak as Ramnam thought. She decided to give them a life lesson that they were wrong and they must know how hurt when she was betrayed by them. Lue's life was turning down when he started being with Ramnam. Nampink got divorced with him, his job had many problems from his gossip. Still, Lue had not uncovered that Ramnam was his wife, which made Ramnam felt upset so bad. Nampink started her new life with the help of her friend "Ratee" and created a good friendship with "Umpon", Ratee's brother. She tried to let Ramnam realized that what goes around, comes around. While Ramnam tried every way to get married with Lue, and also revenge Nampink!
